To say that your warm fuzzies about your ballot choice warrant turning the blind eye to opposing xenophobia is a xenophobic act
Yes, people voted for Trump for non-xenophobic reasons. But being able to vote for him for any reason makes you complicit in xenophobia
If you’re not willing to vote for a candidate who you don’t 100% resonate with to oppose xenophobia, you’re a horrible person
I’m sorry but if you’re willing to look past blatant xenophobia for your political frustrations, that does make you a horrible person
